--- alter_change_stream_set_for_table_columns.sql
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2)

--- AST
&ast.AlterChangeStream{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 20,
    NameEnd: 38,
    Name:    "change_stream_name",
  },
  ChangeStreamAlteration: &ast.ChangeStreamSetFor{
    Set: 39,
    For: &ast.ChangeStreamForTables{
      For:    43,
      Tables: []*ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
        &ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
          Rparen:    75,
          TableName: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 47,
            NameEnd: 58,
            Name:    "table_name1",
          },
          Columns: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 59,
              NameEnd: 66,
              Name:    "column1",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 68,
              NameEnd: 75,
              Name:    "column2",
            },
          },
        },
        &ast.ChangeStreamForTable{
          Rparen:    106,
          TableName: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 78,
            NameEnd: 89,
            Name:    "table_name2",
          },
          Columns: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 90,
              NameEnd: 97,
              Name:    "column1",
            },
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 99,
              NameEnd: 106,
              Name:    "column2",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER CHANGE STREAM change_stream_name SET FOR table_name1(column1, column2), table_name2(column1, column2)
